ListTemplate.summary: Queries templates, including information such as the template name, architecture image URL, and URL of the serialized architecture image file.

schema.description: The number of the page to return.
The number of entries to return on each page.

schema.title: 排序字段
schema.description:
The criterion by which the returned templates are sorted. Valid values:

*   1: The templates are sorted by the time when they are updated.
*   2: The templates are sorted by the time when they are created.
*   3: The templates are sorted by the system.
*   4: The templates are sorted by the number of times that they are used.
*   If you specify an integer other than 1, 2, 3, and 4 or do not specify any value, the templates are sorted by the system.

schema.title: 搜索关键字
schema.description: The keyword that is used to search for templates.

schema.title: 类型
schema.description: The type of the templates to be returned. Valid values: public and private

schema.title: 模板的标签
schema.description: The tag that you want to use to query templates.

ReConfigApplication.summary: You can call an API operation to obtain the list of template variables that you need to reconfigure. If you call the ReConfigApplication operation to reconfigure the variables, the application enters the Modifying state and the properties of the resource nodes that failed to be deployed are reconfigured based on the specified variable values. For example, you can call the ReConfigApplication operation to modify the instance type of a resource node that failed to be deployed. After you call the ReConfigApplication operation, you can redeploy the application.

CreateApplication.summary: Creates an application based on an official template or private template in Cloud Architect Design Tool (CADT). Before you call this operation, make sure that you understand the billing methods and prices of Alibaba Cloud services to be used in the application.

schema.title: 模板ID
schema.description: The ID of the template.

schema.title:
客户端 Token，用于保证请求的幂等性。

从您的客户端生成一个参数值，确保不同请求间该参数值唯一。ClientToken 只支持 ASCII 字符。
schema.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

schema.title: 新建应用名
schema.description:
The name of the application.

*   The application name must be unique. You can call the [ListApplication](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/bp-studio/latest/api-bpstudio-2021-09-31-listapplication) operation to query the existing applications.
*   The application name must be 2 to 128 characters in length. The name must start with a letter and cannot start with `http:// or https://`. The name can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

schema.title: 区域ID
schema.description: The ID of the region.

schema.title: 应用所属资源组ID
schema.description: The ID of the resource group to which the application you want to create belongs.

schema.title: 待替换实例列表
schema.description: The instances in which you want to create the application. You can create applications in an existing virtual private cloud (VPC).

The parameters that are used to configure the application you want to create. For example, enableMonitor specifies whether to automatically create a CloudMonitor task for the application, and enableReport specifies whether to generate reports.
The parameter values that are contained in the template. If the template contains no parameter values, the default values are used.

For example, 192.168.0.0/16 may be returned for a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) instance, ecs.g5.large may be returned for an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance, and slb.s1.small may be returned for a Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance. If the resource does not have a specific type, an empty value is returned.

ListApplication.summary: This API provides a list of all applications under the current user. The optional keyword parameter defines the keywords contained in the application name.

schema.description: The pagination page number of the resulting value cannot be less than the minimum value of 1 and cannot be greater than the maximum value of 10000.
The pagination size of the resulting value cannot be less than the minimum value of 1 and cannot be greater than the maximum value of 50.
Keywords in the app name

schema.title: 排序字段
schema.description:
1 update time,
2 creation time

schema.title: 应用的状态
schema.description: The status of the applications to be returned.
schema.example:
The following values are "success" and "release".
If the input value is "success", the returned application list includes all applications in the Deployed_Success state of successful deployment.
If the input value is release, the returned application list includes all applications in the release success (Destroyed_Success) and release failure (Destroyed_Failure) status.
If this parameter is left blank, the returned app list includes apps in all states.

schema.description: The ID of the resource group.

ListApplication.title: ListApplication
ListApplication.responseParamsDescription:
List of app statuses:

Creating</br>
Modified</br>
Verifying checkout</br>
Verified_Failure Verification failed</br>
Verified_Success Verification succeeded</br>
Valuating</br>
Valuating_Failure Pricing failed</br>
Valuating_Success Valuation successful</br>
Deploying</br>
Deployed_Failure Deployment failed</br>
Partially_Deployed_Success Partially deployed successfully</br>
Deployed_Success Deployment successful</br>
Destroying is being released</br>
Delayed_Destroy Delayed destruction</br>
Destroyed_Failure Release failed</br>
Partially_Destroyed_Success Partial release succeeded</br>
Destroyed_Success Release successful</br>
Revised schema adjustments</br>
Verifying_In_Revision Resource Validation (Schema Tuning)</br>
Verified_Failure_In_Revision Resource Validation Failed (Schema Tuning)</br>
Verified_Success_In_Revision Resource Verification Succeeded (Schema Adjustment)</br>
Valuating_In_Revision Request for quotation (structure adjustment)</br>
Valuating_Failure_In_Revision Request for quotation failed (schema adjustment)</br>
Valuating_Success_In_Revision Successful Request for Quotation (Structural Adjustment)</br>

ExecuteOperationASync.summary: Asynchronous execution of product operation functions.

schema.description: The ID of the Cloud Architect Design Tools (CADT) application.

schema.description: The type of the service. If you want to perform operations on an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance, set ServiceType to ecs.

schema.title: 本次操作类型，例如：attachTag，批量打标; assignResourceGroup，批量分配资源组等
schema.description:
This operation type is the operation type of modifying the product, some operation types are generic, and some are used alone. The following is an example of ECS deployment:
- The name of the ECS: rename
- Specification of ecs: modifyInstanceType
- Startup of ecs: modifyInstanceType
- Stop of ecs: modifyInstanceType
- Restart of ecs: modifyInstanceType
- Ecs Tag: addTags
- Deletion of ecs: ecsDelete
- Paid type for ecs: modifyPayType

AppFailOver.summary: Switches a disaster recovery application to another supported zone.

schema.title: 应用ID
schema.description: The application ID.

schema.title: 容灾切换目标可用区
schema.description: The destination zone to which you want to switch the disaster recovery application.

schema.title: 返回数据
schema.description: The response parameters.

Message.title: 报错信息
Message.description: The returned message. If the request was successful, a success message is returned. If the request failed, an error message is returned.

Data.title: 容灾切换任务码TaskId
Data.description: The disaster recovery switchover task ID.

AppFailOver.title: AppFailOver
AppFailOver.description: You can call this operation to switch a disaster recovery application to another supported zone.

GetPotentialFailZones.summary: Queries the zones where the specified disaster recovery service can be switched.

schema.title: 是否为容灾集ID
schema.description: Specifies whether the value of this parameter is the ID of a disaster recovery set.

schema.title: IsPlanId选择false传入ApplicationId（应用ID），IsPlanId选择true传入PlanId（容灾集ID）
schema.description: If you set IsPlanId to false, specify the ID of a disaster recovery application. If you set IsPlanId to true, specify the ID of a disaster recovery set.

schema.title: 接口返回数据
schema.description: The response parameters.

Message.title: 报错信息
Message.example: The specified ResourceIds are not found in our records.

Data.title: 当前容灾服务可切换的可用区列表
Data.description: The zones where the current disaster recovery service can be switched.

items.title: 当前容灾服务可切换的可用区
items.description: The zone where the current disaster recovery service can be switched.

GetPotentialFailZones.title: GetPotentialFailZones
GetPotentialFailZones.description: You can call this operation to query the zones where the specified disaster recovery service can be switched.

GetFoTaskStatus.summary: Queries the status of a disaster recovery switchover task by task ID.

schema.title: 容灾切换任务ID
schema.description: The disaster recovery switchover task ID.

schema.title: 返回数据
schema.description: The response parameters.

Message.title: 报错信息
Message.description: The returned message. If the request was successful, a success message is returned. If the request failed, an error message is returned.

Data.title: 容灾切换任务Task的状态
Data.description: The status of the switchover task.

GetFoTaskStatus.title: GetFoTaskStatus
GetFoTaskStatus.description: You can call this operation to query the status of a disaster recovery switchover task by task ID.
GetFoTaskStatus.responseParamsDescription:
Task states:

*   Creating: The task is being created.
*   Modified: The task is modified.
*   Verifying: The task is being verified.
*   Verified_Failure: The task failed to pass the verification.
*   Verified_Success: The task passed the verification.
*   Valuating: Fees are being calculated for the task.
*   Valuating_Failure: Fees failed to be calculated for the task.
*   Valuating_Success: Fees are calculated for the task.
*   Deploying: The task is being deployed.
*   Deployed_Failure: The task failed to be deployed.
*   Partially_Deployed_Success: Some resources of the task are deployed.
*   Deployed_Success: The task is deployed.
*   Destroying: The task is being released.
*   Delayed_Destroy: The task release is delayed.
*   Destroyed_Failure: The task failed to be released.
*   Partially_Destroyed_Success: Some resources of the task are released.
*   Destroyed_Success: The task is released.
*   Revised: The task architecture is adjusted.
*   Verifying_In_Revision: The task resources are being verified during architecture adjustment.
*   Verified_Failure_In_Revision: The task resources failed to pass the verification during architecture adjustment.
*   Verified_Success_In_Revision: The task resources are verified during architecture adjustment.
*   Valuating_In_Revision: Fees are being calculated for the task during architecture adjustment.
*   Valuating_Failure_In_Revision: Fees failed to be calculated for the task during architecture adjustment.
*   Valuating_Success_In_Revision: Fees are calculated for the task during architecture adjustment.

AppFailBack.summary: Switches a disaster recovery application back to the primary zone.

schema.title: 应用ID
schema.description: The application ID.

schema.title: 返回数据
schema.description: The response parameters.

Message.title: 报错信息
Message.description: The returned message. If the request was successful, a success message is returned. If the request failed, an error message is returned.

Data.title: 容灾任务切回TaskId
Data.description: The disaster recovery switchback task ID.

AppFailBack.title: AppFailBack
AppFailBack.description: You can call this operation to switch a disaster recovery application back to the primary zone.

ListFoCreatedApps.summary: Queries the information about all disaster recovery plans of the current account.

schema.title: 接口返回数据
schema.description: The response parameters.

Message.title: 报错信息
Message.example: Cannot find region according to your domain.

ReportUrl.title: 报告路径URL
ReportUrl.description: The URL of the error report.

ListFoCreatedApps.title: ListFoCreatedApps
ListFoCreatedApps.description: Queries the information about all disaster recovery plans of the current account.
ListFoCreatedApps.responseParamsDescription:
The states of the applications.

*   Creating: The task is being created.
*   Modified: The task is modified.
*   Verifying: The task is being verified.
*   Verified_Failure: The task failed to pass the verification.
*   Verified_Success: The task passed the verification.
*   Valuating: Fees are being calculated for the task.
*   Valuating_Failure: Fees failed to be calculated for the task.
*   Valuating_Success: Fees are calculated for the task.
*   Deploying: The task is being deployed.
*   Deployed_Failure: The task failed to be deployed.
*   Partially_Deployed_Success: Some resources of the task are deployed.
*   Deployed_Success: The task is deployed.
*   Destroying: The task is being released.
*   Delayed_Destroy: The task release is delayed.
*   Destroyed_Failure: The task failed to be released.
*   Partially_Destroyed_Success: Some resources of the task are released.
*   Destroyed_Success: The task is released.
*   Revised: The task architecture is adjusted.
*   Verifying_In_Revision: The task resources are being verified during architecture adjustment.
*   Verified_Failure_In_Revision: The task resources failed to pass the verification during architecture adjustment.
*   Verified_Success_In_Revision: The task resources are verified during architecture adjustment.
*   Valuating_In_Revision: Fees are being calculated for the task during architecture adjustment.
*   Valuating_Failure_In_Revision: Fees failed to be calculated for the task during architecture adjustment.
*   Valuating_Success_In_Revision: Fees are calculated for the task during architecture adjustment.

schema.description: The application ID.

schema.title: Schema of Response

Message.title: 报错信息

InitAppFailOver.title: InitAppFailOver
InitAppFailOver.description: You can call this operation to prepare for application switchover and initiate a switchover task.

ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags of one or more applications or templates.

schema.title: 幂等标记
schema.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

schema.title: 区域ID
schema.description: The ID of the region.

schema.title: 下一个查询开始Token
schema.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results.

schema.title: 资源类型
schema.description: The resource type.

schema.title: 资源ID,最多 50个子项
schema.description: The resource IDs. You can specify a maximum number of 50 IDs.

items.description: This parameter specifies one or more application IDs when ResourceType is set to application. This parameter specifies one or more template IDs when ResourceType is set to template.

schema.title: 标签列表，最多包含20个子项
schema.description: The tags. A maximum of 20 tags are supported.

NextToken.title: 下一个查询开始Token，NextToken为空说明没有下一个
NextToken.description: The returned value of NextToken is a pagination token, which can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. If the NextToken parameter is empty, no next page exists.

Code.description: The HTTP status code. A value of 200 indicates that the request is successful.

Message.description: The error message returned if the request failed.

TagResources.title: TagResource
TagResources.description: The tags that are added to the resources.

items.description: The tags that are added to specified one or more resources.

ResourceType.description: The resource type. Valid values: application and template.

400.errorMessage: You do not have permission to use this function. Please contact the main account or permission administrator to authorize the relevant permissions.
